Steve Burton’s wife has become the topic of curiosity among his fan base recently. The General Hospital actor’s spouse became the center of attention after the couple got married recently in California.

So, here are all the details fans need to know regarding Burton’s better half, including her age and her profession.

Who is Steve Burton married to?

Steve Burton is married to Michelle Lundstrom.

The couple revealed to People that they met on social media and were good friends for a while before falling in love. “Although we had been friends for a while and lived in different states, there was always an undeniable, electric connection between us. “She is a breath of fresh air,” shared Burton.

Despite keeping their dating phase private, Burton and Lundstrom went official in public in May 2024. (via Daily Drama) Since then, the duo has made many appearances together at events. They also feature frequently on each other’s Instagram accounts.

Burton shared the news of his engagement on the platform with a video compilation of his and Lundstrom’s photos. He wrote in the caption, “Engaged 1/3/25. Jeremiah 29:11 For I know the plans I have for you,” declares the Lord, “plans to prosper you and not to harm you, plans to give you hope and a future.”

Steve Burton and his wife, Michelle Lundstrom, exchanged wedding vows in a ceremony on May 17. Burton told People, “This day isn’t just about a ceremony. It’s the beginning of forever with the love of my life. I get to spend the rest of my life with my best friend, growing together each day in faith and love.”

What is Michelle Lundstrom’s age and job?

Born in New York, Steve Burton’s wife is 44 years old and a chef and content creator by profession.

Michelle Lundstrom is 10 years younger than The Young and the Restless star, who is 54 years old. According to her Instagram handle, she creates her own recipes and shares short clips of the same on the social media platform. On Instagram, Michelle Lundstrom boasts over 103K followers. The food content creator also participated in Season 2 of the Netflix show, Barbecue Showdown, in 2023.
